dict.string: - Audioscrobbler Protocol 1.2 is now supported (and the default). - Songs can now be played in iTunes while a non-Shuffle iPod is syncing with iTunes. iTunes tracks will be queued locally until the sync is complete. - Removed outdated localizations. - Bug Fix: Crash in version checker if an invalid XML file was downloaded. - Bug Fix: Network down status is properly reflected in the note menu at launch.
